item.description:
Cellular Memory Release uncovers unconscious patterns in our operating system. I believe it is also where some of our "past life" memory information comes from.

Once we identify the "emotional matrix" ( how we feel about it) we begin to identify the patterns. We can follow this emotional matrix back to an event or series of events that suppressed it into our cellular memory and how we created these patterns to survive.

Once we identify the cellular memory and re-occurring patterns we can clear them to make way for new higher choices in our lives.

Sound interesting?
item.name: I would be willing to facilitate a Cellular Memory Release event.
